questions.title: 昨晚他去酒吧是真的。
questions.answer: It's true that he went bar yesterday evening.

questions.title: 马铃薯和山芋真的含有大量淀粉。
questions.answer: It's true that potatoes and sweet potatoes contain much starch.

questions.title: 我真的还没有完成工作，所以你可以辞退我。
questions.answer: It's true that I haven't finished this task and you can fire me.

questions.title: 我所有的朋友真的每个周末都需要娱乐消遣。
questions.answer: It's true that all of my friends need recreation each weekend.

questions.title: 我的手稿被我的老板偷走并且被发表了，这是真的。
questions.answer: It's true that my original manuscript has been stolen by my boss and waspublished.

title: ——我怎么能相信你？
——我所做的一切真的都是为了你。

answer.en: It's true that all I did is for you.

title: ——上个星期我真的在伦敦大街上看见大卫·贝克汉姆本人了。
——做梦去吧！

answer.en: It's true that I saw David Beckham in person in the street in Londonlast week.

title: ——你儿子真的是这届的高考状元。
——真的吗？我需要求证。

answer.en: It's true that your son is this top examinee for college entranceexamination.
Really?I need to prove the fact is right.
